title: Live coverage: SpaceX to launch 21 Starlink satellites on Falcon 9 rocket from Cape Canaveral
summary: The mission will bring SpaceX close to having 7,000 Starlink satellites in low Earth orbit. Liftoff from pad 40 at Cape Canaveral Space Force Station is set for 3:22 p.m. EST (2022 UTC).

title: UK Space Agency Launch Director Hints at Major Support for Orbex
summary:

title: After the success of New Glenn, Blue Origin to focus on launching frequently
summary: "This is the very beginning of the Space Age."

title: Smouldering woody debris fuels air pollution over the Amazon
summary: A groundbreaking study, funded by ESA, reveals that fire emissions in the Amazon and Cerrado are largely driven by the smouldering combustion of woody debris. This crucial discovery highlights the significant influence of fuel characteristics on fire emissions, with wide-ranging implications for global carbon cycles, air quality and biodiversity.

title: ESA seeks modest boost to science budget
summary:
The head of ESA’s science programs says she is seeking a “very modest” increase in her budget at ESA’s upcoming ministerial meeting to fund work on future missions.
